title: WHERE DID THE RS. 31 BILLION FLOOD RELIEF MONEY GO, ASKS RAVI KARUNANAYAKE
content: February 05, 2011: The government is saying that they have spent Rs. 31 billion for the flood affected people while the people are claiming that they haven’t received even 5 cents or food, says the United National Party (UNP) parliamentarian Ravi Karunanayake. ravi1Ravi K. expressed this view while addressing a public rally in the Mattakkuliya…
